arctern.wrapper_func Module¶

Functions¶

ST_Point(x, y)

Construct Point geometries according to the coordinates..

ST_Intersection(left, right)

*Calculate the point set intersection of geometries.

ST_IsValid(geos)

For each item in geometries, check if it is of valid geometry format.

ST_PrecisionReduce(geos, precision)

*Reduce the precision of geometry.

ST_Equals(left, right)

*Check whether geometries are "spatially equal".

ST_Touches(left, right)

*Check whether geometries "touch".

ST_Overlaps(left, right)

*Check whether geometries "spatially overlap".

ST_Crosses(left, right)

*Check whether geometries "spatially cross".

ST_IsSimple(geos)

*Check whether geometry is "simple".

ST_GeometryType(geos)

For each geometry in geometries, return a string that indicates is type.

ST_MakeValid(geos)

For every geometry in geometries, create a valid representation of it without losing any of the input vertices.Already-valid geometries won't have further intervention.This function returns geometries which are validated.Note, new geometries are construted in arrow::Array format, so extra memory will be allocated..

ST_SimplifyPreserveTopology(geos, ...)

*For each geometry in geometries create a "simplified" version for it according to the precision that parameter tolerance specifies..

ST_PolygonFromEnvelope(min_x, min_y, max_x, ...)

Construct polygon(rectangle) geometries from arr_min_x, arr_min_y, arr_max_x, arr_max_y.The edges of polygon are parallel to coordinate axis..

ST_Contains(left, right)

*Check whether a geometry contain another geometry.

ST_Intersects(left, right)

*Check whether two geometries intersect.

ST_Within(left, right)

*Check whether a geometry is within another geometry.

ST_Distance(left, right)

*Calculate the distance between two geometries.

ST_Area(geos)

*Calculate the area of geometry.

ST_Centroid(geos)

*Compute the centroid of geometry.

ST_Length(geos)

*Calculate the length of linear geometries.

ST_HausdorffDistance(geo1, geo2)

**

ST_ConvexHull(geos)

*Compute the convex hull of geometry.

ST_NPoints(geos)

Calculates the points number for every geometry in geometries.

ST_Envelope(geos)

Compute the double-precision minimum bounding box geometry for every geometry in geometries.
